snippet: A dashboard camera video released by the authorities Thursday shows the initial encounter between Walter L. Scott and the police officer who killed him.
abstract: South Carolina officials release dashcam video from police cruiser showing initial encounter of seemingly routine traffic stop involving Officer Michael T Slager and driver Walter Scott, before incident in North Charleston spiraled into fatal police shooting and murder charge.
lead_paragraph: A dashboard camera video released by the authorities Thursday shows the initial encounter between Walter L. Scott and the police officer who killed him.

headline.main: New Video Shows Start of South Carolina Police Conflict as Routine
headline.print_headline: New Video Shows Start of Conflict as Routine
